price: 46. Y también (destruimos) antes al pueblo del Profeta Noé. Realmente era un pueblo rebelde (que no obedecía a Al-lah).
arabic: وَقَوۡمَ نُوحٖ مِّن قَبۡلُۖ إِنَّهُمۡ كَانُواْ قَوۡمٗا فَٰسِقِينَ

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: waqawma nūḥin min qablu innahum kānū qawman fāsiqīna
